name: Maira Kodama
bio: Math teacher turned programmer. Fell in love with Rust while listening to Steve Klabnik talk about its design choices. Eternally grateful for helpful compiler messages. Not tall enough to write multi-threaded code.

name: Matthias Wimmer
bio: Using a mixture of C and Rust code at work for bare metal and linux embedded programming since mid 2017. Having done 10+ years of professional Java programming before. Also in love with Clojure, Haskell and functional programming in general.

name: Mark Rousskov
bio: Rust core and infra team member; release team lead. Working on the compiler and related tooling.
